creator: guillaume.levrero@free.fr
text:
With a simple 1 column, multiple row table with header and footer. If the first
child of a cell is a empty block. The row may not get rendered, or you may get
an NPE.

Created attachment 21535
FO to reproduce NPE
creator: guillaume.levrero@free.fr

FO reproduce missing row

text:
Hi Guillaume,

are you sure you tested with the latest version of the Trunk? I didn't manage to
reproduce the problem. It does occur with FOP 0.94, but not with the Trunk.

Please re-open the bug if necessary.

Thanks,
Vincent
